verses.verse: When the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath cut off<WH3772> the nations<WH1471>, whose land<WH776> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, and thou succeedest<WH3423> them, and dwellest<WH3427> in their cities<WH5892>, and in their houses<WH1004>;
Thou shalt separate<WH914> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> for thee in the midst<WH8432> of thy land<WH776>, which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee to possess<WH3423> it.

Thou shalt prepare<WH3559> thee a way<WH1870>, and divide the coasts<WH1366> of thy land<WH776>, which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth thee to inherit<WH5157>, into three parts<WH8027>, that every slayer<WH7523> may flee<WH5127> thither.

¶ And this is the case<WH1697> of the slayer<WH7523>, which shall flee<WH5127> thither, that he may live<WH2425>: Whoso killeth<WH5221> his neighbour<WH7453> ignorantly<WH1097><WH1847>, whom he hated<WH8130> not in time<WH8543> past<WH8032>;

As when a man goeth<WH935> into the wood<WH3293> with his neighbour<WH7453> to hew<WH2404> wood<WH6086>, and his hand<WH3027> fetcheth a stroke<WH5080> with the axe<WH1631> to cut down<WH3772> the tree<WH6086>, and the head<WH1270> slippeth<WH5394> from the helve<WH6086>, and lighteth<WH4672> upon his neighbour<WH7453>, that he die<WH4191>; he shall flee<WH5127> unto one<WH259> of those cities<WH5892>, and live<WH2425>:

Lest the avenger<WH1350> of the blood<WH1818> pursue<WH7291> the slayer<WH310><WH7523>, while<WH3588> his heart<WH3824> is hot<WH3179>, and overtake<WH5381> him, because the way<WH1870> is long<WH7235>, and slay<WH5221> him<WH5315>; whereas he was not worthy<WH4941> of death<WH4194>, inasmuch as<WH3588> he hated<WH8130> him not in time<WH8543> past<WH8032>.
Wherefore I command<WH6680> thee, saying<WH559>, Thou shalt separate<WH914> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> for thee.

And if the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> enlarge<WH7337> thy coast<WH1366>, as he hath sworn<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1>, and give<WH5414> thee all the land<WH776> which he promised<WH1696> to give<WH5414> unto thy fathers<WH1>;

If thou shalt keep<WH8104> all these commandments<WH4687> to do<WH6213> them, which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>, to love<WH157> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and to walk<WH3212> ever<WH3117> in his ways<WH1870>; then shalt thou add<WH3254> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> more for thee, beside these three<WH7969>:

That innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> be not shed<WH8210> in<WH7130> thy land<WH776>, which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee for an inheritance<WH5159>, and so blood<WH1818> be upon thee.

¶ But if any man<WH376> hate<WH8130> his neighbour<WH7453>, and lie in wait<WH693> for him, and rise up<WH6965> against him, and smite<WH5221> him mortally<WH5315> that he die<WH4191>, and fleeth<WH5127> into one<WH259> of these<WH411> cities<WH5892>:

Then the elders<WH2205> of his city<WH5892> shall send<WH7971> and fetch<WH3947> him thence, and deliver<WH5414> him into the hand<WH3027> of the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818>, that he may die<WH4191>.
Thine eye<WH5869> shall not pity<WH2347> him, but thou shalt put away<WH1197> the guilt of innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> from Israel<WH3478>, that it may go well<WH2895> with thee.

¶ Thou shalt not remove<WH5253> thy neighbour's<WH7453> landmark<WH1366>, which they of old time<WH7223> have set<WH1379> in thine inheritance<WH5159>, which thou shalt inherit<WH5157> in the land<WH776> that the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee to possess<WH3423> it.

¶ One<WH259> witness<WH5707> shall not rise up<WH6965> against a man<WH376> for any iniquity<WH5771>, or for any sin<WH2403>, in any sin<WH2399> that he sinneth<WH2398>: at the mouth<WH6310> of two<WH8147> witnesses<WH5707>, or at the mouth<WH6310> of three<WH7969> witnesses<WH5707>, shall the matter<WH1697> be established<WH6965>.
¶ If a false<WH2555> witness<WH5707> rise up<WH6965> against any man<WH376> to testify<WH6030> against him that which is wrong<WH5627>;

Then both<WH8147> the men<WH582>, between whom the controversy<WH7379> is, shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, before<WH6440> the priests<WH3548> and the judges<WH8199>, which shall be in those days<WH3117>;

And the judges<WH8199> shall make diligent<WH3190> inquisition<WH1875>: and, behold, if the witness<WH5707> be a false<WH8267> witness<WH5707>, and hath testified<WH6030> falsely<WH8267> against his brother<WH251>;
Then shall ye do<WH6213> unto him, as he had thought<WH2161> to have done<WH6213> unto his brother<WH251>: so shalt thou put<WH1197> the evil<WH7451> away<WH1197> from among<WH7130> you.
And those which remain<WH7604> shall hear<WH8085>, and fear<WH3372>, and shall henceforth<WH3254> commit<WH6213> no more any<WH1697> such evil<WH7451> among<WH7130> you.

And thine eye<WH5869> shall not pity<WH2347>; but life<WH5315> shall go for life<WH5315>, eye<WH5869> for eye<WH5869>, tooth<WH8127> for tooth<WH8127>, hand<WH3027> for hand<WH3027>, foot<WH7272> for foot<WH7272>.
